snippet: With the crowd against him during the men’s final at the United States Open, Djokovic imagined the cheers were for him and defeated Roger Federer for the title.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column describes interview with Novak Djokovic, who discusses how he has developed strategies that helped him win three of four Grand Slam singles titles this season; notes Djokovic's success in blocking out what may have been one of most hostile crowds in recent history of Grand Slam finals to defeat Roger Federer in US Open.
lead_paragraph: With the crowd against him during the men’s final at the United States Open, Djokovic imagined the cheers were for him and defeated Roger Federer for the title.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic’s Winning Strategy: Mind Over Chatter
headline.main: Novak Djokovic’s Winning Strategy: Mind Over Chatter
